channel.title: Modal Dialog Copy Paste
channel.description: A friend of mine called Mike Becker just passed on a tip that I am now committed to passing on to as many people as I know. You ever needed access to the information in one of those annoying modal...

item.title: Comment by abhijeet+00:00
